ygData.subject: Re: CE: Mages & Barbarians
ygData.msgSnippet: One concern is if team 1 slowed down time and a mage on team 2 decided to slow down time, what would happen?  Worse problem: there are 8 teams in the scenario

One concern is if team 1 slowed down time and a mage on team 2 decided 
to slow down time, what would happen?  Worse problem: there are 8 
teams in the scenario and each one has a mage capable of slowing down 
time.  How would that problem be handled?

Another thing to consider is making the time slow down delay before 
using it again effect the entire team.  What if team 1 had 3 mages?  
Effectively, team 1 could rotate out who slows down time to keep time 
indefinitely frozen.
